metadata.title: CVE-2024-27052 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: rtl8xxxu: add cancel_work_sync() for c2hcmd_workThe workqueue might still be running, when the driver is stopped. Toavoid a use-after-free, call cancel_work_sync() in rtl8xxxu_stop().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
